channel.title: Starting to sprint while changing to certain weapons messes up the animation
channel.description: For example, starting to sprint while switching to the glock results in the left hand being frozen during the animation. I assume this is not intended as it only happens when you start sprinting during the animation.

item.title: Starting to sprint while changing to certain weapons messes up the animation
item.dc:creator: dogelition_man
item.description:
For example, starting to sprint while switching to the glock results in the left hand being frozen during the animation. I assume this is not intended as it only happens when you start sprinting during the animation.
